attributes.action: Change the legal age to take a driving lesson 15
attributes.additional_details: i think that its better to take on more responsibilities at a younger age to help with how you deal with them when you’re older
attributes.background: Make the legal age to take a driving lesson 15 and legal driving age 16

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, that calls for the same action:

Change the legal driving age to 15:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640011
